name: Ningguang
desc:
"Eclipsing Star" Ningguang

The greatest secret she keeps is that she keeps a great many of Liyue's secrets.

customize.name: Ningguang
customize.desc:
"Eclipsing Star" Ningguang

The greatest secret she keeps is that she keeps a great many of Liyue's secrets.

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Carta animata vuota
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Ah, so you'd like to go for a round with me? How interesting."
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Ningguang's deck includes many Location Support Cards and cards that can aid in such combinations, and her Support Zone can stack powerful healing effects and provide ample resources to her.</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Ningguang
customize.desc:
"Eclipsing Star" Ningguang

The greatest secret she keeps is that she keeps a great many of Liyue's secrets.

customize.name: Keqing
customize.desc:
Keqing, Dominatrice del tuono

Può realizzare dei mazzi mai concepiti e vincere delle battaglie impossibili.

customize.name: Ganyu
customize.desc:
Ganyu, Sguardo del plenilunio

"Questo comunicato stampa è programmato per domani...

Immagino che potrei lavorarci stanotte e terminarlo."

customize.name: Invito alla partita
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Ningguang
customize.desc:
"Eclipsing Star" Ningguang

The greatest secret she keeps is that she keeps a great many of Liyue's secrets.

customize.desc:
Ningguang: Strategic Reserve

Abundance is synonymous with confidence.

<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Ningguang" starts with the Talent Card "Strategic Reserve" equipped.</color>

value.text: Reward for inviting Ningguang to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

value.name: Ningguang
value.desc: La Tianquan delle Sette Stelle di Liyue. La sua ricchezza è ineguagliabile in tutta Teyvat.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Skill</color>
Deals 2 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> , creates 1 <color=#ffffff>Jade Screen</color> .
<color=#ece5d8>Jade Screen</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When your active character receives at least 2 DMG</color> : Decrease DMG taken by 1.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 6 <color=#ffe699>Geo DMG</color> . If <color=#ffffff>Jade Screen</color> is on the field, deals +2 DMG.
<color=#ece5d8>Jade Screen</color>
<color=#ffd780>Combat Status</color>
<color=#ffffff>When your active character receives at least 2 DMG</color> : Decrease DMG taken by 1.
<color=#ffffff>Usage(s): 2</color>

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)
[ <color=#ffe699>Geo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Crystallize</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, your active character gains 1 Shield point (Can stack, max 2 points)

<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.
